rows.label: tlk006301_08_msg0001
rows.name:
Acedia have violated a taboo...
Manipulating another Divine Beast is a nigh
unforgivable act.

rows.label: tlk006301_08_msg0002
rows.name:
I urge you to take great caution on
your journey to Acedia.

rows.label: tlk006301_08_msg0003
rows.name:
Alst has celebrated peace for
500 years, but it seems that is now
at an end...

rows.label: tlk006301_08_msg0004
rows.name:
There's no telling what could happen
at this stage, so please, stay vigilant.
